name: Fighting Germs
description:
Fighting Germs is a 2D platformer game endless runner game

The story begins with a girl named Lia, who when doing her research in her lab, find's a way to cure a deadly virus. She creates a micro Injection Capsule which has the antidote to cure the virus. But the antidote has to be specifically used on the heart of the person. 

One day while doing her research, an accident occurs and she gets the powers to shrink to any size a will.

So she decides that with this power she could travel herself in the Injection Capsule into a person's body to cure them from this deadly disease.

She has to face many obstacles on her way, facing different kind of germs and viruses. Will she survive?

||NOTE: THIIS GAME IS IN IT'S EARLY DEVELOPMENT STAGES THIS IS JUST A PRTOTYPE, THERE WILL BE CHANGES IN THE FUTURE(example: new levels, new mechanisms, Actual Story telling before the gameplay, etc).  ||
